text: Xiaohongshu user privacy policy
Xiaohongshu user privacy policy (concise version)
Update date: April 30, 2022
Effective date: May 01, 2022
introduction
Xiaohongshu (hereinafter referred to as "we") respects and protects the personal information and privacy of all Xiaohongshu users.

In order to provide you with more accurate, personalized services and more secure Internet environment, we are based"Personal Information Security Specifications" and other relevant laws and regulations and technical specifications clearly clarify the principles of collecting/use/external information, and further explain the relevant rights on your personal information.

This policy is closely related to the/or services you use. You are downloading, installation, starting, browsing, registering, logging in, and using our products and/or services (hereinafter collectively referred to "using our products and/or services") At the time, we will process and protect your personal information in accordance with the agreement of this policy.
We try to explain the technical vocabulary involved in this policy in a concise expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
There is a major relationship with your rights (possibly) in this policy. We have used bold fonts to distinguish it. Please focus on it.

Xiaohongshu specifically mentioned the attention of minors under the age of 18 (especially children under the age of 14) and their guardians. We have made it clear that the special chapters of the minor protection (prompt with the rough body), please read it carefully.
Before using/continue to use our products and services, read carefully and fully understand this policy, and make appropriate choices in accordance with the guidance of this policy when needed.

If you do not agree with the content of this policy, it may cause our products and/or services to be unable to run normally, or to achieve the service effect we are going to achieve, you should immediately stop access/use our products and/or services.

If you use or continue to use the products and/or services we provide, you all say that you fully understand and agree with all the contents of the "Little Red Book User Privacy Policy" (including the updated version).
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Using or continuing to use products and/or services, it means that you fully understand and agree with all the contents of the "Little Red Book User Privacy Policy" (including the updated version).

text: about Us
The operators of the Xiaohongshu website and APP are Xingyin Information Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. and their affiliated companies.
The registered address is Room 4D67, No. 1611 Cao'an Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai.

1. How do we collect and use your personal information

Eleven, others
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
You understand and agree:

Xiaohongshu is a lifestyle platform for young people. Xiaohongshu uses the mission of "sharing and discovering the world" as "Inspire Lives". Users can record life through short videos, graphics and other forms, share lifestyle, and form based on interests.interactive.

We will explain to you in this policy to explain the scope of personal information, collecting purposes, collection methods, and refusing to provide personal information that may be caused by the results of each function.
Please know that when you refuse to provide the corresponding information you do, you can still use other functions of the Little Red Book APP.

We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary. For the following goals described in this policy, collect and use personal information that you actively provide or use our products and/or services during the use of our service.

Important
First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

2.1. Information browsing, publishing, likes, collection, sharing functions.

2.1.1. The Xiaohongshu may include the information and/or services provided by third -party products and services or links to third parties. Before using the third -party product and/or service, you need to jump to the corresponding applet or third partypage.
